title.cs: Pokročilé reasoning techniky a Red Teaming

description.en: Master defense-in-depth strategies against prompt injection while learning to think like an attacker.
description.cs: Ovládněte strategie hloubkové obrany proti prompt injection a naučte se myslet jako útočník.

learning_outcomes: Understand how prompt injection attacks work
Apply 5 defense-in-depth techniques (Sandwich, Spotlighting, Parametric, Refusal, Filtering)
Execute red teaming exercises to find vulnerabilities
Design secure prompts that resist common attack vectors
Use tools like Lakera Guard for automated security testing
